I'm currently a Developer at SESAC / Harry Fox where I've lead the Front-End team through our first two major hub.harryfox.com application releases and contributed to bug fixes, our first microservice and new features on the backend. Our stack includes Ruby, Angular, Docker, CoffeeScript, RabbitMQ, Gulp, Solr, Oracle and AWS. If you're interested, you can find examples of my code from personal projects on GitHub
